description: 无论你是想模仿草薙京的赤炎拳、乌拉拉的火焰咒、伏地魔的incendio，这个安全又小巧的腕带火焰喷射器都会让你在朋友面前大出风头...
content: Launch face-melting bursts of flames that’ll leave your audience in awe using this open hand fireball launcher. Made with discretion in mind, the compact size makes it easy to conceal and it can also shoot up to two fire balls simultaneously.

description: Sphero出品，星战迷必备。追求情怀之余可以下载配套教育app和孩子一起完成一系列有趣的STEM课程，更别提还可以通过全息仿真给孩子介绍曾让你痴迷的那个a galaxy far far away...
content: When boredom strikes, the Sphero remote control R2-D2 is definitely the droid that you want by your side. It features holographic simulation, authentic movements, and can interact with other Star Wars app-enabled drones.

This modern three person hammock is the ideal place to partake in a lively conversation with friends while enjoying the great outdoors. It features a weather resistant metallic frame and three high quality hammocks designed for maximum comfort.

description: 最高亮度1000流明、可给手机GoPro及任何USB设备充电、内置SOS求救信号、挂帐篷内悬背包后安车把上、防水防摔72小时续航的Lantern Lights多功能手电筒，绝对是居家旅行户外运动的不二之选
content: No matter what type of lighting device the situation calls for this multifunctional flash light is the right tool for the job. This versatile gadget not only functions as a flash light and lantern but can also be used as an SOS strobe and as a charger that will keep your devices juiced up.

description: 咖啡是一种宗教。如果你恰好有位信教的朋友，不管是什么教派 - Starbucks or Philz，Fair trade or Home made，蓝山或摩卡，炭烧或爱尔兰，这本书都会是最棒的礼物
content: Learn about the long and fascinating journey your prized roasts take before they make it to your mug by reading The World Atlas of Coffee. You’ll learn about every aspect of this incredible plant – from its origins and history, to the cultivation process and beyond.

titleEN: Porn For Women Of A Certain Age
description: 不出所料，这本充满了揶揄和幽默的小册子，颇合那些风韵不减的知性熟女胃口，是年轻女性送给姐姐或阿姨的绝佳礼物；对于男性来说，如果想约一位让你怦然心动的知性熟女，熟读这本书会让你马到成功~
content: Add some sizzle to your golden years by going through the sultry pages of Porn for Women of a Certain Age. This tantalizing read depicts forty hot and steamy scenarios that show handsome hotties catering to your every whim.

titleCN: 火箭联盟(Rocket League)竞技游戏箱
description: Hot Wheels出品的这款游戏箱让所有“火箭联盟”(Rocket Leauge)的粉丝们可以在现实中复刻电脑游戏中那些激动人心的场景 - 还犹豫什么，摆好赛车，打开红外，联上蓝牙，开始新一轮的角逐吧！
content: Experience all the thrilling action of a Rocket League game in real life by going head-to-head with your buddy using this Stadium playset from Hot Wheels. The set includes everything you’ll need to bring this exciting and fast-paced game to life.

description: 没有不爱吃饭的狗狗，只有不会撒狗粮的主人！“超级美味狗粮调味料”使用100%纯天然有机原料制成，营养丰富口味诱人，并可以根据爱犬的偏好选择培根、烧烤、花生酱、火鸡、披萨等诸多口味...
content: Throw your canine companion a bone come mealtime by drastically improving the flavor of their food with this gourmet dog food seasoning. It’s made using local and organic ingredients and available in savory flavors like “barkin’ bbq”, “bae’con and eggs”, and “pizza”.

description: 屠龙英雄手中的剑，决斗骑士手中的矛，西部片里拔枪的牛仔，保龄球馆中持球的你。不要像谢耳朵一样在保龄球场上犯妇人之仁的错误，拿着这枚哥特风格的保龄球，让你的对手和球瓶一起颤抖吧...
content: Crush your enemies and hear the lamentation of their women at the local bowling alley while using this intimidating skull bowling ball. With a frightening design, bowling pins will instantly knock over in mortal fear before you even launch the ball down the lane.

titleEN: The Skeptics’ Guide To The Universe
description: 卡尔.萨根《魔鬼出没的世界》(The Demon Haunted World)之后最好的介绍科学怀疑论与批判性思考的著作 - 如果你的朋友不知道卡尔.萨根是谁，请顺便送他/她斯皮尔伯格经典影片《接触》(Contact)的蓝光DVD
content: In a world increasingly filled with alternative facts, learn how to know what’s really real by reading The Skeptics’ Guide To The Universe. This all-encompassing guide to skeptical thinking will help you apply logic and reason to your everyday life.

Blow people’s minds away at the next Sunday BBQ when you hand them hamburger meat in a hot dog bun! The ham dogger is a meat mold that allows you to take beef and contour it into a traditional hot dog shape, giving a fun twist on burgers and hot dogs alike.

description: 我们的生命里总会有几个和我们相爱相杀让我们爱恨交加的敌人兼好友，在抓狂时如何保持冷静并优雅地表达你的不满？“非直接攻击便条”正是为此目的而生，让你既切中要害，又不计前嫌...
content: Express yourself without having to directly encounter another actual human being by leaving behind one of these passive aggressive notes. These effortlessly witty notes allow you to conveniently address a range of behavioral failures in others.

titleCN: 抽屉内置多功能充电器
description: 手机、iPad、笔记本、Kindle、Fitbit...太多需要充电的电子产品让屋子变得不够整洁？使用抽屉内置多功能充电器，轻松地将闲置的抽屉转变成一个隐秘的充电基地吧~
content: Instantly create a discreet charging station anywhere in your home using this in-drawer charging outlet. This easy-to-install outlet features a slim design that’ll fit most standard cabinet sizes so that you can charge up to four devices simultaneously.

description: 再浓郁的爱意也无法在彻夜不休的鼾声中长久，而”打鼾者胶带“致力于解决您的烦恼，无论昨夜如何风急雨骤，保证浓睡后海棠依旧，婴儿般的睡眠体验，每个人都值得拥有~
content: Everyone hates mouth-breathers! So give your partner instant relief from your incessant snoring with this mouth breather tape. It covers your mouth shut for better nose breathing, less mouth breathing, and instant snoring relief so you can both sleep like newborn babies.

Be prepared in case the unthinkable should occur by carrying this spiked self defense ring. The ring features an over-sized pointed tip that protrudes outward when you form a first, so that you can quickly defend yourself against your attacker.

description: 专为旅行而量身定做的极简主义钱包，真皮材质简约设计，不但能安全存放信用卡、现金、护照、登机牌等重要文件，内置RFID保护还可以保证任何电子盗窃都无从下手，信息安全不再有任何后顾之忧
content: Keep important documents safe and at hand while you trot the globe using this minimalist travel wallet. This genuine leather wallet is designed to securely carry everything from credit cards to boarding passes and passports while still maintaining a slim profile.

titleCN: 乐高版星战波尔格鸟套装
titleEN: Life Size LEGO Star Wars Porg Set
description: 无论《星战:最后的绝地武士》这部电影毁誉如何，其中呆萌的波尔格鸟绝对圈粉无数；用这套811片零件的星战系列套装，你可以打造一个属于自己的萌鸟波尔格~
content: Using this life size LEGO Star Wars themed set you’ll be able to construct your very own adorable little porg that you can interact with. Made from 811 pieces, this cute little fella stands over 7 inches tall and can move its mouth and flap its wings.

description: 将你价格不菲的大牌香水简单地喷洒在吊坠上，即可以让香味持续时间增长7倍以上，从而使你无时无刻都可以散发出令人倾倒的淡淡的幽香~
content: Get the most out of your fine and pricey fragrances by accenting your look with some fragrance infusible jewelry. The pendant can be infused with your favorite cologne or perfume in order to make it last approximately seven times longer.

titleEN: Sony V71 High Power Audio System
description: 索尼V71是毋庸置疑的派对大杀器 - 现场音乐会的音效、360°夜店的灯光、电吉他+麦克风的口、炫酷的DJ打碟特效...记住，音浪太强不晃会被撞到地上！
content: The Sony V71 high power audio system will get the party started and keep it going all night long. This Bluetooth enabled device allows you to take full control of the party with a built-in mic input, cool DJ effects, and a 360° party light for an authentic nightclub experience.

description: Bob Ross，美国当代最负盛名的绘画大师和电视节目主持人，如果你对学习油画感兴趣，请去YouTube搜索”The Joy of Painting“，然后一边画油画一边吃吐司吧...
content: Give the most important meal of the day a fun and artsy twist with a few golden Bob Ross toasts. Instead of boring old plain toasts, you’ll be able to enjoy some happy little toasted bread slice that are complemented with a cool little portrait of the late artist.

After much speculation and rumors, the Beastie Boys Book has finally been released. Fans of the iconic and influential group can now sift through the almost 600 pages and learn how they went from an obscure band to a worldwide sensation and household name.

description: 不管你准备装饰美国万圣节还是墨西哥亡灵节，这款充满浓郁哥特风格的骷髅吊灯都绝对能让你客厅的恐怖指数直线飙升，你说这是从《盗墓笔记》片场拿回来的，我绝对相信~💀
content: Add a macabre twist to your humble abode by illuminating the room with this striking skeleton chandelier. Three skeleton torsos sit side by side as they hold candle shaped lights in each hand. It’s the perfect prop for your next Halloween party!

description: 一款非常适合陪着孩子们一边吃餐后点心一边玩儿的趣味游戏 - 当音乐响起时，食物会在皇冠周围盘旋飞舞，考验吃货本色的时候到了，看一看谁能最终尝到胜利的滋味~👑
content: What better way to entertain your foodie friends on game night than with the Chow Crown game? In this fun new game, players must try and eat as many of the dangling food items that are placed on the crown as they float just out of reach of their mouth.

description: 作为热衷户外运动的爱狗人士，这款专为狗狗设计的上车踏板可以保证你的爱犬能毫不费力地飞驰进你的越野车里，和你一起向新的冒险出发~
content: Make it easier for your large canine companion to hop aboard your car by outfitting your ride with this vehicle hitch step for dogs. This portable accessory fits both 1.25 inch and 2 inch hitch receivers and allows for 6 inches of height adjustment.

description: 使用三星SmartThings实时追踪设备，除了可以随时随地打开手机轻松定位任何其附着的物品，还可以预先设置安全区域，一旦物品离开则自动发送警告或位置信息
content: Find important items anytime and from anywhere with help from the SmartThings real time tracking device. Using the accompanying app you’ll easily be able to track this pint-sized device as long as it’s within range of a cellular network.

description: 想把你的楼梯打造成霍格沃茨图书馆的风格吗？尝试这款用环保防水PVC材料制成的可移除3D书架楼梯装饰贴纸，轻易给你的房间增添一丝情趣和书香~
content: Add personality to your home by transforming your plain staircase into an incredible vertical library with these DIY 3D bookshelf stair decals. They’re made from eco-friendly waterproof PVC that is easily removed – making them ideal for any home.

description: 任何星战迷都会对这个淌着口水像鼻涕虫一样缓慢移动的银河系黑社会大佬记忆深刻，这款咖啡杯能让你聊天时绝不冷场 - 你知道贾巴被莱娅公主勒死是卢卡斯向《教父》电影致敬吗？
content: Add a geeky spin to your daily coffee routine by pouring your piping hot brew inside this Jabba The Hut coffee mug. This out-of-this-world mug is microwave-safe and features an XL 26 ounce capacity, which makes it perfect for either beverages or soups.

titleCN: 蓝牙AI骨传导耳机太阳镜
titleEN: Bluetooth AI Bone Conduction Speaker Sunglasses
description: 这款太阳镜充满了007的风格：可接电话，能放音乐，还可以通过蓝牙与手机AI实时对话，更别提革命性的骨传导技术，即直接让声波通过震动传入头骨及至耳膜，彻底让耳机退出了历史舞台~
content: Wear your beats with these bone conduction speaker sunglasses. This revolutionary eyewear features bone conduction speakers that enables it to transmit sound waves directly to the skull via vibrations – eliminating the need for headphones.

description: 和演唱会那些业余水平的荧光棒不同，这款工业级荧光棒展示了专业的素养：耐操、防水、不燃烧、无危险化学成分、并且可以持续发亮12个小时，是户外运动或露营时不可或缺的极品装备~
content: If regular glow sticks just aren’t cutting it, these industrial grade light sticks are sure to get the job done. Unlike their party-friendly counterparts, these sturdy and waterproof sticks are designed to emit a bright green glow that will last for up to 12 hours.

description: 对吃货来说，烤火鸡或做培根剩下的那些油脂堪比液体黄金，怎么舍得轻易倒掉！这款不锈钢打造的油脂储存容器内置防黏着涂层，不但便于清洗，更能保证油脂始终保持初始状态，绝无变质之忧~
content: Don’t you dare throw out that delicious bacon grease! Collect that liquid gold using this bacon grease storage container! The container and strainer are made from wrought iron and given a non-stick coating that will prevent rusting and keep your grease in pristine.

description: 这款迷你机器人呆萌的表情包神似WALL-E，它听得懂语音指令能并智能互动，还可以帮你拍照并按要求发送到社交媒体，另外你还可以让它在家里自动巡航，然后视频传到云端服务器上~
content: Vector is the mini personal robot that’s smart, fun, and affordable. This little fella is always eager to assist you with anything ranging from accessing social media to playing fun games, and can also function as a patrolling security camera and much more!

description: 从NERF枪最基本的动力原理一直进阶到弹簧改造、电路焊接、定制喷漆、3D打印...NERF枪改装达人手把手演示如何将你收藏的孩之宝NERF枪从射程到射速从外观到内部一一完美升级
content: Gain an upper hand in battle by improving your existing NERF blaster with help from this great modification guide. The man behind the YouTube Channel “Out of Darts” will show you how to create a cooler looking blaster with improved firing capacity, range, and speed.

description: 飞船的橘色头灯烘托出宁静的氛围，淡蓝色的银河系在其尾部若隐若现呈现出宇宙的浩瀚，当夜幕降临时，这艘破壁而出的千年隼带给你的不仅仅是光亮，还有些许硬核科幻片的诡异既视感
content: Give your bedroom some out-of-this-world flair and ambient lighting with this Star Wars Millennium Falcon 3D light. The energy safe LEDs create an inviting glow while the design and accompanying wall decal create the illusion that the ship is breaking through the wall.

titleCN: 可充气太阳能便携灯 & 充电器
description: 这款轻巧的产品给所有户外运动爱好者们提供了一个可以从太阳里获取能量的途径 - 充电后既可作为便携式光源，也可作为便携式充电器，从此在户外再无断电之忧
content: This inflatable solar lantern and charger is the versatile accessory that’s a must-have for your next outdoor excursion. This handy device provides a reliable light source and comes fitted with two built-in solar panels so that you can easily charge your electronic devices.

description: 有人喜欢烧火炕，有人喜欢寒玉床，这款双侧可控温度床垫可让你和你的伴侣分别为彼此设置舒适的温度，然后在冰火两重天的一张床上相拥而眠
content: With this dual temperature control mattress pad you and your significant other will be able to sleep in total comfort all night long. The pad allows you to set two different temperatures so that each person can comfortably sleep at their ideal temperature.

description: 将亚马逊这款6英寸的低音扬声器加入你已有的Alexa生态系统，除了让你的客厅看起来越发彰显高科技范儿之外，也静待100W的深低音给耳朵带来和从前完全不同的感受~
content: Improve your auditory experience at home by adding the Amazon Echo sub to your Alexa ecosystem. This 100 watt gadget features a 6″ sub that will add rich bass to your music while boasting a sleek stylish design that will look good in any part of your home.

titleEN: The Pillow For People With Glasses
description: 苦恼于晚上躺在床上追剧或阅读时眼镜在脸侧留下深深的压痕？这款特殊设计的枕头通过轮廓设计达到和戴眼镜的侧脸完美契合，非常适合睡前喜欢追剧和阅读的你~
content: The pillow for people with glasses is your ticket to relaxing in total comfort without having to remove your spectacles. Its contoured design provides support without inhibiting vision or causing uncomfortable pressure on the side of your head, face, or nose.

description: 这部遗著是霍金教授留给全人类最后的话别礼物，如果你对人类的未来感兴趣，比如想了解更多太空殖民计划或探讨上帝在宇宙中存在的可能性，那此书绝对不可不读
content: Published posthumously, “Brief Answers To Big Questions” is Stephen Hawking’s parting gift to humanity. This fascinating read tackles a series of incredibly interesting subjects such as the future of humanity, space colonization, and whether God exists.

description: 英特尔Core i7处理器，NVIDIA GeForce独立显卡，SSD硬盘，28英寸可触屏，1千3百50万真实像素，微软Surface Studio 2带来的是一场发散着创造气息的革命
content: Work more efficiently than ever by upgrading to the Mircrosoft Surface Studio 2. This brilliant piece of machinery boasts a strikingly large 28″ PixelSense display with 13.5 million pixels of true-to-life color that make this the ideal PC for the creative type.

titleCN: 哈利波特牛奶巧克力魔杖
description: 完全仿照哈利的冬青木+凤凰羽毛魔杖制作，并附带一张《初级标准咒语》练习卡，这款牛奶巧克力魔杖大概算是除了巧克力跳蛙和黄油啤酒外最受麻瓜们欢迎的零食了吧~
content: These delectable Harry Potter milk chocolate wands make the perfect gift for a sweet-toothed muggle. Each chocolaty wand is modeled after Harry’s very own wand and comes with a sheet of spells so that you can work on your wizarding skills while you snack!

description: Joe, Java, Brew, Go Juice, Rocket Fuel...不管你叫它什么，虹吸真空咖啡机只要求你注满水并将磨好的咖啡放入，然后等待崭新的一天在香味中到来~
content: Start your day off on the right note by indulging in a rich cup of your own gourmet coffee courtesy of the Syphon vacuum coffee maker. Simply fill the jug up with water, add the coffee grounds to the top chamber, and switch on the base to enjoy your brew in mere minutes.

titleCN: 一次性紧急使用汽油罐
description: 便于注入油箱的设计、对儿童安全的软管、可折叠存储的特性，这款一加仑容量的一次性汽油罐专为紧急时刻存在，让你一边酝酿讲给朋友听的故事，一边安全抵达加油站
content: Maximize your car’s limited storage space by ditching your bulky gas can for this emergency one-time use gas can. This one gallon capacity gas can comes with features like an easy pour handle and child-proof nozzle and is fully collapsible for easy storage.

description: 约翰.勃朗宁设计的.45口径半自动手枪M1911，作为美军制式手枪历经一战二战韩战越战及海湾战争，更通过反恐精英游戏被中国玩家熟知，毋庸多言，经典中的经典
content: Proclaim yourself sheriff and restore order in the work place by arming yourself with the Model 1911 rubber band gun. This handmade walnut and hard maple semi-automatic piece sports an all-wood construction and can hold and fire up to six rubber bands.

titleCN: 施华洛世奇水晶星战雕塑
description: 完全按照星战中最受粉丝钟爱的角色精雕细琢，每个细节都彰显高超工艺让人啧啧称奇，不论放在那里，这款水晶雕塑都能让房间蓬荜生辉，更会让你的朋友们垂涎不止
content: Make every Star Wars geek in the galaxy green with envy by placing these magnificent Swarovski Crystal character sculptures on display. These out-of-this-world figurines are masterfully crafted to faithfully resemble their on-screen counterparts in striking detail.

description: 选择困难症患者的终极福音！这枚直径1.5英尺，两面分别镌刻着“hell naw”和“f*ck yeah”的硬币，让你从此把生活中所有艰难的抉择都交付给万有引力和随机概率
content: Leave all of your tough life choices up to fate by putting all your trust in the decision coin. This 1.5 inch diameter brass coin comes with “hell naw” engraved on one side and “f*ck yeah” engraved on the opposite side – so you never have to stress over another decision ever again.

description: 让所有辗转反侧都成为过往的黑科技，Bose这款白噪音助眠耳机专门为提高睡眠质量而设计，佩戴整晚绝无不任何适感，精心挑选的舒缓白噪音让你重新体验婴儿般的优质睡眠~
content: Slumber more soundly than you ever thought possible by inserting these noise-masking sleepbuds from Bose in your ears before hitting the hay. Instead of music, these sleepbuds play a series of pre-loaded soothing sounds that cover up unwanted outside noise.

description: Solenya vs Jaguar！作为《瑞克和莫蒂》的铁粉，你绝对不应该错过这款让你有机会重温酸黄瓜瑞克和俄国杀手美洲虎之间那场黑色幽默与肾上腺素都疯狂飙升的经典对决！
content: Live out one of Rick Sanchez’s most zany adventures by sitting down to play The Pickle Rick game. Inspired by the hilarious season 3 episode, one player takes on the role of Solenya while the other plays as Jaguar and tries to prevent The Pickle Man from escaping the compound.

description: Turn your man cave to bat cave! 将哥谭市夜间守护神的经典徽章嵌入你书房的墙上，让你在书海徜徉时也充满正义之光~
content: Give your man cave a little bat cave inspired flair by mounting these awesome Batman bookshelves on your wall. Styled like the Caped Crusader’s iconic bat symbol, these two-piece shelves make the perfect gift for the kid or comic book fanatic in your life.

titleCN: 多功能一件套婴儿围兜
description: 初为父母手忙脚乱？工作繁忙马不停蹄？这款多功能一件套婴儿围兜可随时变零食匣或午餐盒，让你不再为宝宝吃饭的兵荒马乱而狼狈不堪，从此和你的小天使一起乐享生活~
content: This one-piece bib and baby plate is a heaven-sent for any parent who’s forced to feed their little one on-the-go. The clever and ultra functional design serves as a lunchbox, plate, and bib so that Jr. can comfortably eat on his own without making a total mess.

description: 除了高保真音乐和超浑厚低音，这款设计独特的扬声器让你有机会展示艺术天赋，只需指尖轻轻在手机APP上一抹，即可在怀旧的16*16像素+256纯彩色的荧幕上欣赏昨日的情怀
content: Add a striking visual component to your favorite jams using this neat little pixel art Bluetooth speaker from Divoom. This small retro-designed omni-directional speaker lets you create, display, and share custom digital art while you jam out.

description: 这款由雪松木制成的100%可降解无铅石墨铅笔末尾有一个密封胶囊，里面藏有罗勒、亚麻、或百里香的种子，在快用完时将其埋入花盆回馈大自然，给孩子最好的环保第一课 🌱
content: Give back to Mother Nature for all the paper and writing utensils you’ve consumed over the years with the sprout pencils. These eco-friendly cedar pencils contain a capsule at the end that allows you to plant the pencil after it gets down to a stump.

titleCN: 将一切变成鱼子酱的转换器
description: 能把任何食物加工成鱼子酱既视感的神奇产品，轻松将平常的食材变成米其林三星，让不知就里的亲朋好友对你的厨艺及品味刮目相看，切记，盘子一定要大，分量一定要少喔~
content: Impress friends and family with your sophisticated palate by preparing your food using this spherical food converter. It lets you turn almost anything into tiny edible caviar shaped pearls that look like they would cost a fortune.

description: 每一个红色小瓶中都装着由精选阿拉比卡咖啡豆磨制的深烘焙咖啡，保证不管你在世界哪一个角落，都可以在浓厚的香味中品尝到家的味道~ ☕️
content: Enjoy a coffee house quality cup of Joe nearly anywhere you venture to by bringing along this handcrafted instant coffee. Each little plastic vial comes with a premium roast that can instantly be prepared and enjoyed either hot or cold.

titleEN: Grim Workshop Lockpick Probe Micro Tool
description: 《民调局异闻录》里描述了一个能打开任何锁从而让所有人垂涎的宝物龙须，而这款迷你开锁器则会给你带来同样的能力，电子锁机械锁密码锁，统统不在话下，一起去古灵阁好吗~
content: Get serious about your burgeoning breaking and entering career by perfecting your skills using the lock pick tool kit. This professional quality tool kit provides you with everything you’ll need to get through virtually any lock that you encounter.

titleEN: The Flashlight That Runs On Any Battery
description: 一款对电池没有任何挑剔的手电筒终于出现了！不论你手边的电池型号是AAA，AA，C还是D，松下无差别电池手电筒全部一视同仁，若是4款电池都装满，则86小时续航无间断！
content: The flashlight that runs on any battery is the flashlight we’ve all been waiting for. The Any-Battery flashlight from Panasonic will work with either AAA, AA, C, or D batteries and can be utilized as either a flashlight or a lantern.

titleCN: 手工制作内嵌子弹烈酒杯
description: 英语双关语好难翻译，Shot Glass原本是喝烈酒的小酒杯，但Shot又有被子弹击中的意思，所以这款内嵌子弹的烈酒杯充满了创意，而且看起来非常“西部世界”...
content: If this lodged bullet shot glass proves just one thing, is that alcohol and firearms are the perfect combination. Each shot glass is expertly hand-blown and fitted with a real .308 bullet lodged into the side, creating the illusion that the glass is nearly unbreakable.

description: 轻松好用的可触屏控制面板，便于清洗的可拆除不锈钢保护膜，给食材均匀加温的360度水循环，真空低温精密烹调锅给你带来健康的烹饪方法和全新的美食概念
content: With the Sous Vide precision cooker you’ll be able to whip up dishes so incredibly tender your dinner guests will think they’re dining at a 5-star restaurant. It heats up and maintains water inside the pot to a precise temperature, allowing for maximum moisture retention.

titleEN: Easy To Use Meat & Poultry Injector
description: 使用这款简单易用的味道注射器，你可以将秘方配制的酱汁或调料轻松地注射进鲜嫩的煎牛排烤乳猪和熏鳕鱼里，精密烹饪由此开始，不想当医生的厨师不是合格的吃货
content: Leave your dinner guests begging for seconds by utilizing this easy to use meat and poultry injector. It features a large handle so that you can pull and push from any angle and boasts a wide stainless steel needle that is ideal for thick sauces and marinates.

description: 这款不起眼的小电器可以同时帮你给家里的硬木地板和地毯清洁并洗涤，从而给你打游戏看小说追美剧刷抖音省出更多时间，(黑)科技永远是第一生产力啊
content: Cut down your weekly chore time by cleaning floors more efficiently than ever with the CrossWave wet-dry vacuum. This dual-purpose appliance allows you to simultaneously vacuum and wash your hardwood floors, rugs, or carpets.

titleCN: 乐高迷你城市建筑师手册
description: 这本乐高迷你城市建筑师手册是每个见习小建筑师不可或缺的启蒙教材，从摩天大楼到跨海大桥，书中精美的插画和详细的讲解，让建筑师之梦从乐高迷你城市启航
content: This LEGO Micro Cities book is a must-have for any architect-in-training. This incredibly well illustrated and written book will show you how to construct incredibly intricate miniature cities complete with everything from bridges to towering skyscrapers.

description: 在G-Shock系列35周年庆之际，卡西欧推出了及其吸睛的G-Shock金色骨感男士腕表，除了一如既往的精密及耐操品质外，粗粝中隐藏高贵的金色外观也让这块纪念款与众不同
content: To commemorate their 35th anniversary, Casio has released these eye-catching G-Shock skeleton gold watches. Featuring the same quality and durability you’ve come to expect from the brand, they boast a stunning gold design just as beautiful as it is rugged.

titleCN: 自带灯光秀的便携式DJ混音器
titleEN: LED Light Show Portable DJ Mixer
description: 高音清脆，低音浑厚，灯光炫目，节奏激昂，无数双手在空中舞动，即兴打碟让血脉偾张，荷尔蒙的气息在人群中弥漫，这款便携式DJ混音器让你的派对从始至终热度超常！
content: Instantly get the party started by overloading everyone’s senses with this LED light show portable DJ mixer. This all-in-one party essential provides crisp sound, stunning visuals, and comes with a built-in 6 hour rechargeable battery.

description: 控制玩具小人踩着炫酷的悬浮板，借助自带的飞行助力系统，在空中做出包括720滚筒旋转在内的各种让人瞠目结舌的超高难度特技，毋庸置疑，这款玩具让所有孩子梦想成真~
content: Carve up the sky and pull off amazing aerial stunts by getting your hands on this R/C flying hoverboard. It can be flown as either a paraglider or a hoverboard and boasts flight assist technology that will help you pull off some incredible tricks like a 720 degree spin.

description: 不管你是在世界屋脊采雪莲、热带岛屿扮海盗、非洲草原看角马，这款便携式太阳能发电机确保即便远离尘世，你依然有足够的电量供给电子设备，从而和文明世界保持丝缕联系
content: Ensure you’re never left without power, even if you’re miles away from civilization by plugging your devices into this portable off-grid solar generator kit. It can either be charged by solar or AC power and features everything from DC to USB ports.

description: 这款多功能射钞枪能用传单、名片、打折券、及各种钞票当弹药，是婚礼、夜店、公司团建、生日派对不可或缺的气氛营造道具...别多说了，请扣动扳机火力全开吧~
content: Spread the wealth like a true baller by showering everyone with the Make It Rain money shooter. Apart from helping you share your hard earned cash with others, this battery operated party must-have also works with coupons, business cards, playing cards, and more!

titleCN: 实时太阳能面板电量使用监视器
description: 将此产品安装在屋顶的太阳能面板上并和家中WiFi连接，然后便可轻松地在手机APP上实时查看太阳能面板生产的电量以及家里消耗的电量，让你的生活更加数字化
content: Monitoring your home’s solar energy production is as easy as checking your smartphone with this real time electricity usage monitor from Sense. It allows you to easily see how much electricity is being produced and used in your home at any given time.

description: 每个家长都会经历小朋友把“屎尿屁”每天挂在嘴边的“语言敏感期”，这套橡皮泥套装可以帮助你的小不点儿释放想象力，创造出一套独具风格的粑粑军团~
content: Make playing with poop something the whole family can look forward to by sitting down with this Play-Doh Poop Troop playset. You and your little sculptors will be able to make fun and whimsical characters out of squishy Play-Doh turds.

titleCN: 惊悚窥视狂恶作剧道具
description: 没有任何一部恐怖片的惊悚度，可以和现实中不经意一瞥时，看到一张邪恶面孔正在窗外窥视你相提并论！请慎用这款恶作剧道具，否则友尽船翻指日可待...
content: Teach your children about stranger danger in the most cruel and unforgivable way possible with the creepy peeping Tom prank toy. Simply place Mr. Tom at the lowest point of your kid’s window and watch as they spend the rest of their lives forever traumatized.

titleCN: 紫外线手机消毒+充电盒
description: 研究表明，手机表面携带的细菌是公共卫生间的18倍左右，这款设计独特的设备可在充电之际通过紫外线杀死手机表面99.9%的细菌，还其清白之身
content: Studies have shown that phones typically have 18 times more harmful bacteria than any surface in a public bathroom. This unique device charges your phone while utilizing UV lights to kill up to 99.99% of bacteria off of your phone’s surface.

description: 手持这款产品在打印文字上轻轻滑过，内容就会被瞬间扫描进电脑当中，若是再支持繁体中文的话，去杂书馆看线装书时做笔记用，简直不要太合适！
content: Increase your productivity by creating projects and reports in record time the Scanmarker digital highlighter. Simply slide this handheld scanning pen across a line of printed text and watch it appear instantly on your computer screen!

description: 这款包装风格堪比基努里维斯黑客帝国造型的富含黄腐酸自然碱性水，a.k.a.黑水，让你深刻体验H2O黑暗的一面，在畅饮解渴的同时彻底颠覆你的世界观
content: Experience the power of the dark side of h2o with natural black water. Enriched with fulvic acid that creates a natural black color, this unusual bottled water will quench your thirst and melt your brain as you have your world turned upside down.

titleCN: 和弦伴侣：吉他学习体系
description: 这款设计巧妙并在美国ABC电视台王牌节目“Shark Tank”上亮过相的创意产品，革命性地颠覆了吉他学习的方法论，让音乐之梦从即刻起不再遥不可及
content: Learn to shred like the music gods in no time at all with the guitar learning system. This ingenious device goes over the guitar and shows you how to play the different chords with your fingers. It even includes a 60 day instructional program to help you get started.

description: 如何在不用冰桶的情况下为你最喜欢的葡萄酒制冷？使用这款FDA认证过的红酒制冷瓶塞，可确保懂酒的你在最合适的温度品尝到最好年份的佳酿
content: Keep your favorite vino perfectly chilled without watering it down with ice by inserting this wine chilling stick into your bottle. This must-have accessory will keep your prized wine at the perfect drinking temperature for up to one hour.

titleCN: 可当做椅子的旅行背包
description: 虽然听起来酷似《国产007》里达文西的某项发明，但当你在卢浮宫外排队、在乞力马扎罗露营、在东单地铁弹吉他的时候，你不会后悔选择了一款可以当椅子用的背包
content: Make the traveling process a little less taxing on your body by packing your things inside the BagoBago backpack chair. It features ample storage space along with a sturdy built-in stool that you can easily pull out any time you need a place to sit.

description: 这款设计独特可装8.4盎司啤酒的纤长玻璃杯，是有品位的啤酒爱好者们写代码做方案画图纸撸烤串时不可或缺之物，人间不值得，管它half glass empty还是half glass full
content: No self respecting beer lover’s home bar would be complete without a few of these half pint beer glasses. It can hold up to 8.4 ounces and features a long slender design that will make them a sure-fire conversation piece with all your drinking buddies.

description: 头上顶一缕金黄色的假发，胸前戴一抹星条旗领带，若再加一本《时代周刊》 - 无论你身处政治光谱的哪一边，都无法否认这套川普款爱犬造型装make your dog great again!
content: No matter what side of the political spectrum you find yourself on, everyone will agree this Donald Trump dog costume will make your pooch great again. Your furry friend will look simply dashing in his totally natural looking blonde toupe and American flag tie.

titleEN: 1,000 Books To Read Before You Die
description: 这本只有区区948页却被《华盛顿邮报》誉为“终极图书馆阅读清单”的书，涵盖了荷马史诗、巴尔扎克、奥兹国、金银岛...绝对应该被出国英语培训机构列为托福GRE写作课必读书目
content: If you’re looking for your next great read, you need 1,000 Books To Read Before Your Die! It features a list that spans throughout time and different cultures to cover everything from fiction, poetry and children’s books, to biographies, travel writing, and memoirs.

titleCN: 腌黄瓜瑞克可充气道具服装
description: 如果妳的男朋友是卡通片《瑞克和莫蒂》的粉丝，这款经典的腌黄瓜瑞克可充气道具服装可能是万圣节送给他最好的礼物，俗话说得好，有什么比扮演荒诞疯狂又酗酒的老科学家更有趣？
content: Fill Halloween night with laughter instead of screams by transforming yourself into a giant Pickle Rick! This hilarious and preposterous officially licensed inflatable costume includes everything you’ll need to become the pickled version of your favorite mad scientist.

description: 将水沿着管道缓缓注入底部后轻轻晃动水鼓，然后闭上眼睛聆听由30根不锈钢金属管互相撞击彼此时发出的诡异声响，毛骨悚然的声效让你有置身恐怖片其中的惊悚感，切记，不要睁眼！
content: Place the finishing touch on your haunted home this Halloween by adding an eerie soundtrack using this horror movie sound effects instrument. It features a stainless iron design with a total of 30 metal sticks that surround the instrument and create horrifying sounds.

description: 一根合金棒，两根阻力绳，简单的器具创意设计后却能变出纷繁的使用方法，能有效帮助健身爱好者们增强核心力量、平衡感、及灵活性，是流汗治愈系里不可或缺的必备之选
content: Improve your mobility and overall strength by incorporating the AlphaPro strength and conditioning tool into your workout. With the bar and resistance bands you’ll be able to perform functional exercises that will improve flexibility, stability, and coordination.

description: Baguette? Donut? Brown Sugar Bread or French Toast? 喜欢烘焙的你一定很喜欢将刚出炉香味四溢的面包穿在脚上的那种蓬松而温暖的舒适感~
content: Loafing around will take on new meaning once you spend a day vegging around your home in these comfy bread slippers. These comical slippers are styled like two light and fluffy loafs of bread that look like they just came out of the oven.

description: 熄灭最后一盏灯，在柔和的爵士乐中妳褪去酒红色晚礼裙，黑暗里只有你曼妙身材上的性感内衣发出挑逗般的淡淡光芒，夜晚是你的舞台，你是最性感女神
content: These glow in the dark lingerie panties are the ideal way to top off your wild party outfit. Simply hold it to the light for a period of 3-5 minutes, and this trendy low rider thong will emit a hypnotizing blue glow that’ll keep the fun going after the lights go off.

description: 这款别出匠心的产品采用双墙式聚丙烯船壳的独特设计，使其可以折叠成手提箱大小，让每个夏日喜欢去湖边泛舟钓鱼的你，不再为托运独木舟而烦恼~
content: As fun as kayaks are, they’re a down right pain to transport! But the collapsible kayak solves this problem with its ingenious design. The Oru Kayak features a unique double-wall polypropylene hull that you can fold down to the size of a suitcase for easy transport.

description: 骁龙845芯片组，1200万双摄像头，4000mAh电池超长续航，120Hz高刷新率LCD屏，64GB标配内存，低(闷)调(骚)可调光logo，游戏玩家专属手机
content: Keep the game going anywhere you are by upgrading to the Razer Phone 2 gaming smartphone. Specifically designed for mobile gaming, it boasts features like an ultra fast Snapdragon 845 chip set, a large 4,000 mAh battery, and a 120Hz ultramotion display.

description: 这款设计独特的雨伞可以抵挡50mph的狂风，更通过反向开合技术彻底解决了传统雨伞在狭小空间开合时造成的种种不便(比如在倾盆大雨时钻入车子的那一刻)
content: This wind proof reverse open umbrella makes getting in and out of vehicles more convenient than ever before! The umbrella’s unique design allows you to open and close it in tighter spaces than traditional umbrellas while also being able to withstand winds in excess of 50 mph.

description: 这款不到7磅重的240瓦移动电源在充足电后可以支持2个迷你冰箱、4台笔记本、18部智能手机、40款Gopro，5架无人机...绝对是露营和应急时的必备之选
content: The Jackery Explorer 240 is the 240-watt capacity power station that will keep your campsite running without weighing you down. Coming in at under 7 lbs, it features 2 USB Outputs, an AC outlet, and a car port with surge and short circuit protection.

Keep your gums and teeth healthy without putting any toxic ingredients into your mouth by brushing with this all natural charcoal teeth whitening toothpaste. With organic ingredients like bamboo charcoal, this unique toothpaste will safely remove years of stains.

description: 海盐、茉莉、栀子花，柠檬、广藿、薰衣草，可可、乳木、山茶花，蓖麻、月桂，迷迭香...热爱地球的你当然选用纯天然的配方和纯天然的味道~
content: Do your part for our planet and ditch traditional plastic shampoo bottles for these vibrant shampoo bars. Designed to last up to 80 washes, each colorful bar is crafted from all-natural ingredients that will nurture your hair and leave it smelling great.

description: 支持60帧高清播放的四核处理器，双频WIFI，语音搜索，从Netflix/Amazon Prime到HBO/ESPN，再加独有的Damai中文频道，你喜欢的尽在其中
content: Cut the cord with your cable company once and for all and step into the future with the Roku Premiere 4K streaming device. This mighty device boasts a quad core processor, features a simple setup, and will give you access to 500,000+ movies and TV episodes.

description: 这款防锈、防水、防咬的喂鸟器，能感知松鼠的重量自动关闭出食口，精心设计的通风装置会让食物长期保持干燥，从而吸引更多的鸟儿来享受免费午餐
content: Keep those thieving little squirrels from stealing the food you put out for the birdies with this squirrel proof bird feeder. It’s chew-proof, rustproof, waterproof, and is designed so that the weight of an adult squirrel automatically shuts the seed ports.

description: 如果你读过里八神的《寻猫记》，那么应该知道喵星人可在时间和宇宙的各个维度自由穿梭，那这是款做成宇宙飞船样子的猫舍，还是做成猫舍样子的宇宙飞船？
content: These quirky spaceship cat beds are the perfect place for your feline overlord to gaze over his vast domain in total comfort. Offering a spectacular view for your kitty, this small cylinder provides ample ventilation and can either be mounted onto the wall or placed on a stand.

description: 北欧神话的海怪，克鲁苏世界的主宰，它在神道教浮世绘里充满情色，它在南非世界杯时一语成谶，这款颜色鲜艳的八腕目布袋玩偶，让孩子们窥探神奇的世界
content: Sock puppets are old news, if you really want to impress the kiddos these days, then this red octopus hand puppet is the way to go! This brightly colored cephalopod allows you to slip your hand under its body and use your fingers to make his tentacles wiggle.

description: 9V的电池+传感器+LED灯+伺服电机+纸质模板+贴纸+配套手机APP=可由声音激活的自动机械抓臂？如你所见，这是一款志在培养未来科学家和学术领袖们的STEM玩具
content: Get your kids interested in the sciences from early on by making learning fun with the littleBits Base Inventor Kit. It will challenge your future scientists and academics to build fun and playful inventions while learning valuable STEM skills.

titleCN: 高仿真提利昂·兰尼斯特面具
description: 戴上这款医用级别硅胶制作、纯手工雕塑及上色的高仿真提利昂·兰尼斯特(a.k.a.“小恶魔”)面具，欣赏你所有喜欢《权力的游戏》的朋友们脸上大惊失色的表情
content: Amaze every Game of Thrones fan you encounter on the street by becoming the living embodiment of Tyrion Lannister with this incredible realistic mask. It’s crafted from medical-grade silicone and is entirely sculpted, painted, and decorated by hand.

description: TP-LINK出品的这款智能WiFi插座，可通过手机APP或语音指令(支持Alexa及Google Assistant)控制6个独立的充电插座和2个独立的USB接口，智能家居一步之遥
content: Control your electronics from virtually anywhere by plugging them into the Kasa smart Wi-Fi power strip. It comes with six independently controlled smart outlets and three built-in USB ports so that you can control and monitor the electrical output of each device.

description: 这款8英尺长由玻璃纤维加强尼龙为刀柄、2Cr13不锈钢为刀刃的螺旋状匕首，如果只用一个词来形容其致命性和锋利程度的话，那只能是：Dragonglass Dagger(龙晶匕首)
content: When it comes to piercing factor, the spiral blade knife stands in a class of its own. This deadly knife comes with a fiberglass reinforced nylon handle for a secure grip and features an 8 inch 2Cr13 stainless steel blade with 3 distinct cutting edges.

description: 使用这款专门为喜欢cuddling(贴身睡)的伴侣们准备的专用枕，你再也不必因为你的伴侣喜欢枕着你那已被压得麻木而失去知觉的臂膀安然入睡而愁云密布辗转反侧了
content: Coodle is the cuddling pillow that lets you sleep in a more comfortable position without having your arm fall asleep. The bridge shape of the pillow allows your partner to rest their head on top of your arm without your arm becoming trapped.

description: 当你从吧台墙上拿出这款用锻铁打造、面目狰狞、充斥着浓郁哥特气息的头骨骷髅开瓶器，用其牙齿撬开一瓶瓶精酿啤酒时，不必多说话，你的硬汉气质就已将所有人征服
content: Why settle for a regular bottle opener when you can pop open your cold one using the teeth of a skull mounted on your home bar’s wall? This sinister skull is crafted from cast iron and makes the ideal addition for any home bar or man cave.

titleCN: 给宠物穿的蜘蛛道具服
description: 这款为15磅以下宠物准备的万圣节道具服，可以将你萌宠的爱犬与爱猫轻易地变成长着八条毛绒绒的长腿、行动敏捷、面容可憎、让人唯恐避之不及的大狼蛛~
content: Transform your cute pet into an adorable arachnid by getting them into the Halloween spirit with this pet spider costume. Designed for small pets weighing up to 15 pounds, this wacky getup features eight furry legs that you can position any way that you want.

titleCN: 侏罗纪世界同款可遥控机器迅猛龙
titleEN: Jurassic World Trainable Robotic Pet Blue
description: 这款按照《侏罗纪世界》里最受粉丝喜欢的迅猛龙Blue制作的同款玩具，可以让你可以影片中欧文一样拿着遥控器，训练并操纵这只行动灵活的爬行动物杀手
content: Fulfill your career goals by becoming a real life raptor trainer with this Jurassic World trainable robot. Modeled after fan-favorite raptor Blue, it comes with its very own remote control that is styled just like Owen’s clicker so that you can easily control your clever girl.
